cast.name: 卡森·克雷斯利 Carson Kressley

this_title: Get a Room with Carson & Thom
introduction: Carson Kressley and Thom Filicia are here to help fight the uniformity and ubiquity of American home design. Thom takes Carson under his wing to teach him interior design by channeling Carson's impeccable sense for fashion. The duo will create breathtaking and affordable home redesigns for their lucky clients using expert skills mixed with their signature endearing charm fans fell in love with during Queer Eye for the Straight Guy.
chinese_title: Get a Room with Carson & Thom
